title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Mix pasta, bacon, and egg mixture.
Season with black pepper and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a buttery & creamy tomato gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken with tikka paste and grill.
Mix in grilled chicken and cream.
Cook until thick and serve with rice.
